player_connected.name: player_connected
player_connected.description: The player just connected to the server. Called once per connection when the player entity has been created.

player_disconnecting.name: player_disconnecting
player_disconnecting.description: The player is disconnecting from the server. Called before the player entity is removed.
player_disconnecting.example:
event_player_disconnecting:
    iprintlnbold("Player " + self.entnum + " is disconnecting!")
end

player_spawned.name: player_spawned
player_spawned.description: The player has spawned. Called when the player has entered the battle, respawned, or spawned with weapons. Can be called even for spectators.
player_spawned.example:
event_player_spawned:
    iprintlnbold("Player " + self.entnum + " just spawned!")
end

player_damaged.name: player_damaged
player_damaged.description: The player got hit and took damage.

parameters.name: local.attacker
parameters.description: The entity that caused the damage

parameters.name: local.inflictor
parameters.description: The entity that directly caused the damage (projectile, explosion, etc.)

parameters.name: local.position
parameters.description: Vector position where damage was applied

player_damaged.example:
event_player_damaged local.attacker local.damage local.inflictor local.position local.direction local.normal local.knockback local.damageflags local.meansofdeath local.location:
    iprintlnbold("Player " + self.entnum + " took " + local.damage + " damage!")
end

player_killed.name: player_killed
player_killed.description: The player got killed. Called when the player's health reaches zero or below.

parameters.name: local.attacker
parameters.description: The entity that caused the killing blow

parameters.name: local.damage
parameters.description: Amount of damage that killed the player

parameters.name: local.inflictor
parameters.description: The entity that directly caused the death

parameters.name: local.position
parameters.description: Vector position where fatal damage was applied

parameters.name: local.direction
parameters.description: Direction vector of the fatal damage

player_killed.example:
event_player_killed local.attacker local.damage local.inflictor local.position local.direction local.normal local.knockback local.damageflags local.meansofdeath local.location:
    iprintlnbold("Player " + self.entnum + " was killed by " + local.attacker.entnum)
end

player_textMessage.name: player_textMessage
player_textMessage.description: The player sent a text message. Return 0 to block the message, or a string to block and reply to the player.

parameters.name: local.text
parameters.description: The raw text message the client sent

player_kill.name: player_kill
player_kill.example:
event_player_kill local.attacker local.attacker2 local.victim local.inflictor local.location local.meansofdeath:
    iprintlnbold(local.attacker.netname + " killed " + local.victim.netname)
end

player_death.name: player_death
player_death.example:
event_player_death local.victim local.inflictor:
    iprintlnbold("Player " + local.victim.netname + " died")
end

player_damage.name: player_damage
player_damage.example:
event_player_damage local.victim local.attacker local.damage local.meansofdeath:
    iprintlnbold(local.victim.netname + " took " + local.damage + " damage")
end

player_pain.name: player_pain
player_pain.description: A player experienced pain with hit location info.
player_pain.example:
event_player_pain local.victim local.attacker local.damage local.meansofdeath local.hit_location:
    iprintlnbold(local.victim.netname + " hit in " + local.hit_location)
end

player_headshot.name: player_headshot
player_headshot.description: A player got a headshot kill.

parameters.name: local.attacker
parameters.description: The player who got the headshot

player_headshot.example:
event_player_headshot local.attacker local.victim local.weapon_name:
    iprintlnbold(local.attacker.netname + " headshot " + local.victim.netname + " with " + local.weapon_name)
end

player_crushed.name: player_crushed
player_crushed.example:
event_player_crushed local.victim local.attacker:
    iprintlnbold(local.victim.netname + " was crushed")
end

player_telefragged.name: player_telefragged
player_telefragged.example:
event_player_telefragged local.victim local.attacker:
    iprintlnbold(local.victim.netname + " was telefragged by " + local.attacker.netname)
end

player_roadkill.name: player_roadkill
player_roadkill.description: A player was killed by a vehicle.

parameters.name: local.attacker
parameters.description: The driver who got the roadkill

parameters.name: local.victim
parameters.description: The player who was run over

player_roadkill.example:
event_player_roadkill local.attacker local.victim:
    iprintlnbold(local.attacker.netname + " ran over " + local.victim.netname)
end

player_bash.name: player_bash
player_bash.description: A player got a melee bash kill.
player_bash.example:
event_player_bash local.attacker local.victim:
    iprintlnbold(local.attacker.netname + " bashed " + local.victim.netname)
end

player_teamkill.name: player_teamkill
player_teamkill.example:
event_player_teamkill local.killer local.victim:
    iprintlnbold(local.killer.netname + " team killed " + local.victim.netname)
end

weapon_fire.name: weapon_fire

weapon_hit.name: weapon_hit

parameters.name: local.hit_location_or_type
parameters.description: Hit location or 'projectile' for projectile hits

weapon_hit.example:
event_weapon_hit local.owner local.target local.hit_location_or_type:
    iprintlnbold(local.owner.netname + " hit " + local.target.netname)
end

weapon_reload.name: weapon_reload

weapon_reload_done.name: weapon_reload_done

weapon_change.name: weapon_change
weapon_change.example:
event_weapon_change local.owner local.old_weapon local.new_weapon local.client_num:
    iprintlnbold(local.owner.netname + " switched from " + local.old_weapon + " to " + local.new_weapon)
end

weapon_ready.name: weapon_ready

weapon_no_ammo.name: weapon_no_ammo
weapon_no_ammo.description: A weapon ran out of ammo.
weapon_no_ammo.example:
event_weapon_no_ammo local.owner local.weapon_name:
    iprintlnbold(local.owner.netname + " is out of ammo for " + local.weapon_name)
end

weapon_holster.name: weapon_holster

weapon_raise.name: weapon_raise

weapon_drop.name: weapon_drop
weapon_drop.example:
event_weapon_drop local.previous_owner local.weapon_entity:
    iprintlnbold(local.previous_owner.netname + " dropped a weapon")
end

grenade_throw.name: grenade_throw
grenade_throw.example:
event_grenade_throw local.owner local.projectile_entity:
    iprintlnbold(local.owner.netname + " threw a grenade")
end

grenade_explode.name: grenade_explode

player_land.name: player_land

player_distance.name: player_distance
player_distance.example:
event_player_distance local.walked local.sprinted local.swam local.driven:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " walked " + local.walked + " units")
end

ladder_mount.name: ladder_mount

ladder_dismount.name: ladder_dismount

player_use.name: player_use
player_use.example:
event_player_use local.target_entity:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " used something")
end

player_use_object_start.name: player_use_object_start
player_use_object_start.description: A player started using an object.

player_use_object_finish.name: player_use_object_finish
player_use_object_finish.description: A player finished using an object.

player_spectate.name: player_spectate
player_spectate.example:
event_player_spectate:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " became a spectator")
end

player_freeze.name: player_freeze
player_freeze.description: A player was frozen or unfrozen.
player_freeze.example:
event_player_freeze local.frozen_state:
    if (local.frozen_state == 1)
        iprintlnbold(self.netname + " is frozen")
    else
        iprintlnbold(self.netname + " is unfrozen")
    end
end

player_say.name: player_say
player_say.description: A player sent a chat message (extended event).
player_say.example:
event_player_say local.message_text:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " said: " + local.message_text)
end

item_pickup.name: item_pickup
item_pickup.description: A player picked up an item.
item_pickup.example:
event_item_pickup local.item_name local.amount:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " picked up " + local.item_name)
end

item_drop.name: item_drop
item_drop.example:
event_item_drop local.item_name:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " dropped " + local.item_name)
end

item_respawn.name: item_respawn
item_respawn.description: An item respawned on the map.

health_pickup.name: health_pickup
health_pickup.example:
event_health_pickup local.heal_amount:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " picked up " + local.heal_amount + " health")
end

ammo_pickup.name: ammo_pickup
ammo_pickup.example:
event_ammo_pickup local.ammo_name local.amount:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " picked up " + local.amount + " " + local.ammo_name)
end

armor_pickup.name: armor_pickup
armor_pickup.example:
event_armor_pickup local.armor_amount:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " picked up " + local.armor_amount + " armor")
end

vehicle_enter.name: vehicle_enter
vehicle_enter.example:
event_vehicle_enter local.vehicle_entity:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " entered a vehicle")
end

vehicle_exit.name: vehicle_exit
vehicle_exit.example:
event_vehicle_exit local.vehicle_entity:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " exited a vehicle")
end

vehicle_collision.name: vehicle_collision

turret_enter.name: turret_enter
turret_enter.example:
event_turret_enter local.turret_entity:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " entered a turret")
end

turret_exit.name: turret_exit
turret_exit.example:
event_turret_exit local.turret_entity:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " exited a turret")
end

server_console_command.name: server_console_command
server_console_command.example:
event_server_console_command local.command_string:
    iprintlnbold("Server command: " + local.command_string)
end

server_process_start.name: server_process_start
server_process_start.description: The server process just started. Called once per server executable start (not per map).

server_process_quit.name: server_process_quit
server_process_quit.description: The server process is quitting. Called once when the server executable is shutting down.

map_shutdown.name: map_shutdown

map_ready.name: map_ready
map_ready.description: The map is ready and all entities have spawned.
map_ready.example:
event_map_ready local.map_name local.gametype:
    iprintlnbold("Map " + local.map_name + " is ready, gametype " + local.gametype)
end

map_load_start.name: map_load_start
map_load_start.description: A map is starting to load.
map_load_start.example:
event_map_load_start local.map_name:
    iprintlnbold("Loading map " + local.map_name)
end

map_load_end.name: map_load_end
map_load_end.example:
event_map_load_end local.map_name local.gametype:
    iprintlnbold("Map " + local.map_name + " loaded")
end

map_change_start.name: map_change_start
map_change_start.example:
event_map_change_start local.current_map local.next_map:
    iprintlnbold("Changing from " + local.current_map + " to " + local.next_map)
end

map_restart.name: map_restart
map_restart.example:
event_map_restart local.map_name:
    iprintlnbold("Map " + local.map_name + " restarted")
end

game_init.name: game_init
game_init.example:
event_game_init local.gametype:
    iprintlnbold("Game initialized with gametype " + local.gametype)
end

team_win.name: team_win
team_win.example:
event_team_win local.winning_team_num:
    iprintlnbold("Team " + local.winning_team_num + " wins!")
end

match_end.name: match_end
match_end.example:
event_match_end local.map_name local.gametype local.winning_team:
    iprintlnbold("Match ended on " + local.map_name)
end

intermission_start.name: intermission_start

warmup_start.name: warmup_start
warmup_start.example:
event_warmup_start local.map_name:
    iprintlnbold("Warmup started on " + local.map_name)
end

warmup_end.name: warmup_end
warmup_end.example:
event_warmup_end local.map_name:
    iprintlnbold("Warmup ended on " + local.map_name)
end

objective_update.name: objective_update
objective_update.example:
event_objective_update local.objective_index local.new_status:
    iprintlnbold("Objective " + local.objective_index + " changed to " + local.new_status)
end

team_join.name: team_join
team_join.example:
event_team_join local.old_team local.new_team:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " changed from team " + local.old_team + " to " + local.new_team)
end

vote_start.name: vote_start
vote_start.self: The player who started the vote
vote_start.example:
event_vote_start local.vote_name local.vote_string:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " started vote: " + local.vote_name)
end

vote_passed.name: vote_passed
vote_passed.example:
event_vote_passed local.vote_name local.vote_string local.yes_count local.no_count:
    iprintlnbold("Vote passed: " + local.vote_name + " (" + local.yes_count + " yes, " + local.no_count + " no)")
end

vote_failed.name: vote_failed
vote_failed.example:
event_vote_failed local.vote_name local.fail_reason local.yes_count local.no_count:
    iprintlnbold("Vote failed: " + local.vote_name + " (" + local.fail_reason + ")")
end

objective_capture.name: objective_capture
objective_capture.example:
event_objective_capture local.controller_team:
    iprintlnbold("Objective captured by team " + local.controller_team)
end

client_connect.name: client_connect
client_connect.description: A client connected. Player entity not yet created.
client_connect.example:
event_client_connect local.client_num:
    iprintlnbold("Client " + local.client_num + " connected")
end

player_inactivity_drop.name: player_inactivity_drop
player_inactivity_drop.description: A player was dropped for inactivity.
player_inactivity_drop.example:
event_player_inactivity_drop:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " was dropped for inactivity")
end

door_open.name: door_open

explosion.name: explosion

actor_killed.name: actor_killed

bot_killed.name: bot_killed
bot_killed.example:
event_bot_killed local.attacker:
    iprintlnbold("Bot killed by " + local.attacker.netname)
end

bot_roam.name: bot_roam

bot_curious.name: bot_curious

bot_attack.name: bot_attack

score_change.name: score_change
score_change.example:
event_score_change local.score_type local.delta local.new_total:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " " + local.score_type + " changed by " + local.delta + " to " + local.new_total)
end

teamkill_kick.name: teamkill_kick
teamkill_kick.description: A player was kicked for excessive team killing.
teamkill_kick.example:
event_teamkill_kick local.teamkill_count:
    iprintlnbold(self.netname + " kicked for " + local.teamkill_count + " team kills")
end
